about.first: I am a 22 years old developer from Corrientes Argentina.
about.second: I discovered programming more than a year ago, and since then I have been training my skills as a web developer, learning every day.
about.third: I have experience developing E-Commerces, Landing pages and Web Apps. I consider myself better on the Front-end but I've been getting into Back-end technologies for a few months now.
about.fourth: Since I was a child I have been a fan of technology, games and science, I am always willing to talk about these topics.
